oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Public Works Subcommittee Reports, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reports detailed the formation of a Public Works Department. The Public Works Department, per the Proposed Charter, would be responsible for all road maintenance and sanctioned improvement projects. The report called for the appointment of a Public Works Director and a Bi-County Solid Waste Management Board.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Public works
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
